page.title: 05Shops,The Oval,Pin Green.
page.content: I surveyed 100 people shopping at the Oval,a{neighbourhood}centre.80 live in the Pin Green area and use the Oval mainly for small shopping.Most shop here once or twice a week,but 10 shop here 3 times and 20 shop here 6 times a week.60 of the Oval shoppers do their main shopping in the{New Town centre,36 at the Oval and 4 elsewhere. Sixty of the shoppers shop in the Town Centre only once a week.The most popular shops in the{Town Centre}for main shopping are Tesco's and Sains- bury's supermarkets. { At the Oval}there is a bank,a "take- away Chinese ", a greengrocer, a butcher, a betting shop, a newsagent /Post Office,2 hair- dressers,a toy shop,a dry cleaner,a laundrette,an off-licence,a chemist,a hardware store,2 supermarkets,a motorparts shop and an electric appliance shop.
